title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.13 - Public appearance under drugs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.13 - Public appearance under drugs

State Regulations

No person shall appear in any transportation facility under
the influence of narcotics or a drug other than alcohol to the degree that he
may endanger himself or other persons or property, or annoy persons in his
vicinity. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1151.13

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
